elementData.appearance: As graphite: black. As diamond: clear
Yellow in the  three main phases (solid allotrope alpha is opaque and beta is transparent)
Most common: Crystalline  is metallic bluish gray. Amorphous is a brown powder
Two most common: White and waxy or red amorphous. Less common: alpha is violet and beta is black.
Greenish yellow in main three phases
Allotropes Metallic gray black or red
Beta allotrope is silvery white.  Alpha allotrope is lusterous gray
Solid: dark metallic gray Gas: violet
Silvery white, with a light blue glow
Silver and glows purple in the dark
